label: 倶利伽羅
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 2:  Heian Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1999
説明文: The site of a decisive battle in the fifth month of 1183 won by Yoshinaka against the Taira troops led b Koremori; located in Etchū (near the present boundary of Ishikawa and Toyama prefectures near the Sea of Japan) (p. 704). [源義仲、平維盛、越中、石川、富山]
